description: Non Material Amendment to allow rationalisation of the footprint of the building, relocating a plant room closer to road access and bringing a previously external drama studio into the footprint of the building. Adaptation of the Bathroom Blocks at each classroom to accommodate three WC's to meet the Building Bulletin Requirements. Roof Access rationalised with external access stairs removed and level access form the First floor added. Additional Fire Escape door added to main sports hall, to meet Building Bulletin requirements. Brise Soleil removed form North elevation. Pavilion Building: Removal of redundant windows to the WC in rear elevation, Roof Lowered and pitch reduced to provide improved shading to the External Seated area of planning permission 00083/L/P18 for Erection of a part single part two storey building to form new junior school with a single storey sports pavilion and associated landscaping, access road and parking
